messages.message:
Update: @Balaram thank you so much for the meeting.
For my current use case, I will work on the prompts and ensure I get the right outputs. I will wait for "Custom Instructions" to be available to fully test the capabilities of the bot.

To customise the way chatbot responds, custom instructions (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-1285) should help. We are planning to work on this in next quarter.

On the memory feature, I will work with the team to figure out what we are missing here.
